readable.title: 783353797_fdf91bdf4c
readable.content: A girl is on the sidewalk looking at a white van in the street . A woman in white is pointed at by a sign on the road saying look right . A woman standing in front of the words " Look Right " painted on a street . The little girl in a white dress stands by a street with white words written on it . The words " Look Right " with an arrow painted on a city street , with a female in the foreground .
